trans-unit.source: Building Blocks in B2B Messaging
trans-unit.target: Building Blocks in B2B Messaging

trans-unit.source: The key constituents of B2B messaging are the trading partners, business profiles, agreements, and bridges.
trans-unit.target: The key constituents of B2B messaging are the trading partners, business profiles, agreements, and bridges.

trans-unit.source: This article provides information on each of these and how they are implemented in the <token>tpm_portal</token>.
trans-unit.target: This article provides information on each of these and how they are implemented in the <token>tpm_portal</token>.

trans-unit.source: It also provides information about the flow of a typical B2B solution and how the different building blocks work together.
trans-unit.target: It also provides information about the flow of a typical B2B solution and how the different building blocks work together.

trans-unit.source: Trading partners
trans-unit.target: Trading partners

trans-unit.source: Each participating organization in a business relationship is a trading partner.
trans-unit.target: Each participating organization in a business relationship is a trading partner.

trans-unit.source: A business partnership involves two or more trading partners.
trans-unit.target: A business partnership involves two or more trading partners.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <token>tpm_portal</token> to create a trading partner.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <token>tpm_portal</token> to create a trading partner.

trans-unit.source: Business profiles
trans-unit.target: Business profiles

trans-unit.source: A trading partner’s business profile represents the business divisions inside a trading partner organization.
trans-unit.target: A trading partner’s business profile represents the business divisions inside a trading partner organization.

trans-unit.source: For example, two business divisions, “Payment” and “Shipping”, within a trading partner organization can be represented as business profiles in the <token>tpm_portal</token>.
trans-unit.target: For example, two business divisions, “Payment” and “Shipping”, within a trading partner organization can be represented as business profiles in the <token>tpm_portal</token>.

trans-unit.source: Profiles include the property settings that are commonly used when configuring agreements between partners, such as the certificates that are used sign and encrypt messages exchanged between the partners.
trans-unit.target: Profiles include the property settings that are commonly used when configuring agreements between partners, such as the certificates that are used sign and encrypt messages exchanged between the partners.

trans-unit.source: Certificates uploaded for a profile
trans-unit.target: Certificates uploaded for a profile

trans-unit.source: Certificates uploaded to a partner’s profile are used to sign/un-sign and encrypt/decrypt messages.
trans-unit.target: Certificates uploaded to a partner’s profile are used to sign/un-sign and encrypt/decrypt messages.

trans-unit.source: Trading partner agreement
trans-unit.target: Trading partner agreement

trans-unit.source: A Trading partner agreement is defined as a definitive and binding agreement between two trading partners for transacting messages over a specific B2B protocol.
trans-unit.target: A Trading partner agreement is defined as a definitive and binding agreement between two trading partners for transacting messages over a specific B2B protocol.

trans-unit.source: An agreement defines the protocol, and the related properties, that are used by the trading partners for exchanging messages.
trans-unit.target: An agreement defines the protocol, and the related properties, that are used by the trading partners for exchanging messages.

trans-unit.source: Bridges
trans-unit.target: Bridges

trans-unit.source: A bridge configuration defines the schema of the message to be processed, any transforms that must be used while processing the message, and the endpoints where the message is routed to.
trans-unit.target: A bridge configuration defines the schema of the message to be processed, any transforms that must be used while processing the message, and the endpoints where the message is routed to.

trans-unit.source: Bridges use agreements at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Bridges use agreements at runtime.

trans-unit.source: For more information on how a bridge resolves to an agreement, see <link xlink:href="f3a8d261-0ada-4798-b079-68ede2cda850" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How do bridges associate with agreements at runtime?</link>
trans-unit.target: For more information on how a bridge resolves to an agreement, see <link xlink:href="f3a8d261-0ada-4798-b079-68ede2cda850" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How do bridges associate with agreements at runtime?</link>

trans-unit.source: Putting the blocks together
trans-unit.target: Putting the blocks together

trans-unit.source: This section details the flow of a typical B2B solution and how the different building blocks work together.
trans-unit.target: This section details the flow of a typical B2B solution and how the different building blocks work together.

trans-unit.source: This section also lists some best practices for modeling a B2B solution.
trans-unit.target: This section also lists some best practices for modeling a B2B solution.

trans-unit.source: Create partners representing all the organizations involved in a business trade.
trans-unit.target: Create partners representing all the organizations involved in a business trade.

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are two business organizations involved in a business trade, you must create a trading partner for each of them.
trans-unit.target: For example, if there are two business organizations involved in a business trade, you must create a trading partner for each of them.

trans-unit.source: For instructions on how to create trading partners, see <link xlink:href="5b993139-3261-49b2-a778-f46aee74365b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Manage Partners and Profiles in Azure BizTalk Services</link>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions on how to create trading partners, see <link xlink:href="5b993139-3261-49b2-a778-f46aee74365b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Manage Partners and Profiles in Azure BizTalk Services</link>.

trans-unit.source: Creating a partner automatically creates a default profile for the partner.
trans-unit.target: Creating a partner automatically creates a default profile for the partner.

trans-unit.source: For each business division within a partner organization, create more profile if required.
trans-unit.target: For each business division within a partner organization, create more profile if required.

trans-unit.source: Also, you must create the business profiles not just for the partner representing your organization but also for the partner with which you trade.
trans-unit.target: Also, you must create the business profiles not just for the partner representing your organization but also for the partner with which you trade.

trans-unit.source: For more information on creating profiles, see <link xlink:href="5b993139-3261-49b2-a778-f46aee74365b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Manage Partners and Profiles in Azure BizTalk Services</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on creating profiles, see <link xlink:href="5b993139-3261-49b2-a778-f46aee74365b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Manage Partners and Profiles in Azure BizTalk Services</link>.

trans-unit.source: Create agreements between the business profiles.
trans-unit.target: Create agreements between the business profiles.

trans-unit.source: For instructions on how to create agreements, see <link xlink:href="df2ee20f-a063-42f8-b9d1-ea6c3abdbfed" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Managing Agreements</link>.
trans-unit.target: For instructions on how to create agreements, see <link xlink:href="df2ee20f-a063-42f8-b9d1-ea6c3abdbfed" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Managing Agreements</link>.

trans-unit.source: Create bridges to process the messages exchanged between the trading partners.
trans-unit.target: Create bridges to process the messages exchanged between the trading partners.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="458c2c17-be30-4fdb-b438-5683e38dd9c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an EDI bridge using BizTalk Services Portal</link> or <link xlink:href="7894ebb3-c8f9-45db-942b-ed487656d6b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an AS2 bridge using BizTalk Services Portal</link>.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="458c2c17-be30-4fdb-b438-5683e38dd9c9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an EDI bridge using BizTalk Services Portal</link> or <link xlink:href="7894ebb3-c8f9-45db-942b-ed487656d6b9" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an AS2 bridge using BizTalk Services Portal</link>.
